consummate verb [T]
(HAVE SEX)
law
  specialized to make a marriage or romantic relationship complete by having sex: The marriage was never consummated.
consummate verb [T]
(COMPLETE)
formal to make something complete or perfect

perfect; complete in every way: consummate skill
to complete: The deal was consummated with a handshake.
To consummate a marriage is to make it complete by having sex.
